continue.description: Load project context, alignment audit, status check, suggest next action. Auto-invoke at session start, after context switches, or when user says 'continue', 'resume', 'what's next', 'status check'.

done.description: Self-evolving session completion: validate, sync, heal, evolve, report, commit. Auto-invoke when user says 'done', 'finished', 'wrap up', 'commit this', 'push it', 'ship it'.

piv.description: Self-recursive development loop: research, plan, execute, validate, heal, repeat. Auto-invoke when user says 'piv', 'autopilot', 'ship it', 'full validation', 'keep going until done'.
